io.amelia.tasks

Class Tasks

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.amelia.tasks.Tasks
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class Tasks
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages task scheduled in the main thread

    • Method Detail

      • callSyncMethod

        public static <T> java.util.concurrent.Future<T> callSyncMethod(RegistrarBase creator,
                                                                java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> task)
        Deprecated. 
        Calls a method on the main thread and returns a Future object This task will be executed by the main server thread.

        Note: The Future.get() methods must NOT be called from the main thread. Note2: There is at least an average of 10ms latency until the isDone() method returns true.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The callable's return type
        Parameters:
        creator - TaskCreator that owns the task
        task - Task to be executed
        Returns:
        Future Future object related to the task

      • cancelAllTasks

        public static void cancelAllTasks()
        Deprecated. 
        Removes all tasks from the manager.

      • cancelTask

        public static void cancelTask(int taskId)
        Deprecated. 
        Removes task from scheduler.
        Parameters:
        taskId - Id number of task to be removed

      • cancelTask

        public static void cancelTask(CallableTask callable)
        Deprecated. 
        Removes the task based on the callable.
        Parameters:
        callable - The callable assigned to the task

      • cancelTask

        public static void cancelTask(Task task)
        Deprecated. 

      • cancelTasks

        public static void cancelTasks(RegistrarBase creator)
        Deprecated. 
        Removes all tasks associated with a particular creator from the scheduler.
        Parameters:
        creator - Owner of tasks to be removed

      • getActiveWorkers

        public static java.util.List<Worker> getActiveWorkers()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a list of all active workers.

        This list contains async tasks that are being executed by separate threads.

        Returns:
        Active workers

      • getPendingTasks

        public static java.util.List<Task> getPendingTasks()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a list of all pending tasks. The ordering of the tasks is not related to their order of execution.
        Returns:
        Active workers

      • heartbeat

        public static void heartbeat(long currentTick)
        Deprecated. 
        This method is designed to never block or wait for locks; an immediate execution of all current tasks.

      • isCurrentlyRunning

        public static boolean isCurrentlyRunning(int taskId)
        Deprecated. 
        Check if the task currently running.

        A repeating task might not be running currently, but will be running in the future. A task that has finished, and does not repeat, will not be running ever again.

        Explicitly, a task is running if there exists a thread for it, and that thread is alive.

        Parameters:
        taskId - The task to check.

        Returns:
        If the task is currently running.

      • isQueued

        public static boolean isQueued(int taskId)
        Deprecated. 
        Check if the task queued to be run later.

        If a repeating task is currently running, it might not be queued now but could be in the future. A task that is not queued, and not running, will not be queued again.

        Parameters:
        taskId - The task to check.

        Returns:
        If the task is queued to be run.

      • runTask

        @Deprecated
public static Task runTask(RegistrarBase creator,
                                       CallableTask callable)
        Deprecated. Use LooperRouter instead.
        Returns a task that will run on the next server tick.
        Parameters:
        creator - the reference to the creator scheduling task
        callable - the task to be run
        Returns:
        a Task that contains the id number
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if creator is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if task is null

      • runTaskAsynchronously

        @Deprecated
public static Task runTaskAsynchronously(RegistrarBase creator,
                                                     CallableTask callable)
        Deprecated. Use LooperRouter instead.
        Asynchronous tasks should never access any API in Main. Great care should be taken to assure the thread-safety of asynchronous tasks.

        Returns a task that will run asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        creator - the reference to the creator scheduling task
        callable - the task to be run
        Returns:
        a ChioriTask that contains the id number
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if creator is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if task is null

      • runTaskLater

        @Deprecated
public static Task runTaskLater(RegistrarBase creator,
                                            long delay,
                                            CallableTask callable)
        Deprecated. Use LooperRouter instead.
        Returns a task that will run after the specified number of server ticks.
        Parameters:
        creator - the reference to the creator scheduling task
        delay - the ticks to wait before running the task
        callable - the task to be run
        Returns:
        a Task that contains the id number
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if creator is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if task is null

      • runTaskLaterAsynchronously

        @Deprecated
public static Task runTaskLaterAsynchronously(RegistrarBase creator,
                                                          long delay,
                                                          CallableTask callable)
        Deprecated. Use LooperRouter instead.
        Asynchronous tasks should never access any API in Main. Great care should be taken to assure the thread-safety of asynchronous tasks.

        Returns a task that will run asynchronously after the specified number of server ticks.
        Parameters:
        creator - the reference to the creator scheduling task
        delay - the ticks to wait before running the task
        callable - the task to be run
        Returns:
        a ChioriTask that contains the id number
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if creator is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if task is null

      • runTaskTimer

        @Deprecated
public static Task runTaskTimer(RegistrarBase creator,
                                            long delay,
                                            long period,
                                            CallableTask callable)
        Deprecated. Use LooperRouter instead.
        Returns a task that will repeatedly run until cancelled, starting after the specified number of server ticks.
        Parameters:
        creator - the reference to the creator scheduling task
        delay - the ticks to wait before running the task
        period - the ticks to wait between runs
        callable - the task to be run
        Returns:
        a ChioriTask that contains the id number
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if creator is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if task is null

      • runTaskTimerAsynchronously

        @Deprecated
public static Task runTaskTimerAsynchronously(RegistrarBase creator,
                                                          long delay,
                                                          long period,
                                                          CallableTask callable)
        Deprecated. Use LooperRouter instead.
        Asynchronous tasks should never access any API in Main. Great care should be taken to assure the thread-safety of asynchronous tasks.

        Returns a task that will repeatedly run asynchronously until cancelled, starting after the specified number of server ticks.
        Parameters:
        creator - the reference to the creator scheduling task
        delay - the ticks to wait before running the task for the first time
        period - the ticks to wait between runs
        callable - the task to be run
        Returns:
        a ChioriTask that contains the id number
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if creator is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if task is null

public static void runTaskWithTimeout(RegistrarBase creator,
                                                  long timeout,
                                                  CallableTask callable)
        Deprecated. 

      • scheduleAsyncDelayedTask

        public static int scheduleAsyncDelayedTask(RegistrarBase creator,
                                           long delay,
                                           CallableTask task)
        Deprecated. 
        Asynchronous tasks should never access any API in Main. Great care should be taken to assure the thread-safety of asynchronous tasks.

        Schedules a once off task to occur after a delay. This task will be executed by a thread managed by the scheduler.
        Parameters:
        creator - TaskCreator that owns the task
        task - Task to be executed
        delay - Delay in server ticks before executing task
        Returns:
        Task id number (-1 if scheduling failed)

      • scheduleAsyncDelayedTask

        public static int scheduleAsyncDelayedTask(RegistrarBase creator,
                                           CallableTask task)
        Deprecated. 
        Asynchronous tasks should never access any API in Main. Great care should be taken to assure the thread-safety of asynchronous tasks.

        Schedules a once off task to occur as soon as possible. This task will be executed by a thread managed by the scheduler.
        Parameters:
        creator - TaskCreator that owns the task
        task - Task to be executed
        Returns:
        Task id number (-1 if scheduling failed)

      • scheduleAsyncRepeatingTask

        public static int scheduleAsyncRepeatingTask(RegistrarBase creator,
                                             long delay,
                                             long period,
                                             CallableTask callable)
        Deprecated. 
        Asynchronous tasks should never access any API in Main. Great care should be taken to assure the thread-safety of asynchronous tasks.

        Schedules a repeating task. This task will be executed by a thread managed by the scheduler.
        Parameters:
        creator - TaskCreator that owns the task
        delay - Delay in server ticks before executing first repeat
        period - Period in server ticks of the task
        callable - Task to be executed
        Returns:
        Task id number (-1 if scheduling failed), calling cancelTask(int) will cancel it

      • scheduleSyncDelayedTask

        public static int scheduleSyncDelayedTask(RegistrarBase creator,
                                          long delay,
                                          CallableTask task)
        Deprecated. 
        Schedules a once off task to occur after a delay. This task will be executed by the main server thread.
        Parameters:
        creator - TaskCreator that owns the task
        task - Task to be executed
        delay - Delay in server ticks before executing task
        Returns:
        Task id number (-1 if scheduling failed)
